Detailed Description

This class creates a grid of animation values for the flora vertex shader.

It blends perlin noise in with a wind amount, that is settable using the watchers ( or python watchers interface ).

The watchers controlling wind are in "Client Settings/Flora/Wind X" "Client Settings/Flora/Wind Z"
